text: Then some scribes who had come down from JerusalemThey had come all the way to Galilee, just to combat Jesus. started saying, “He has Beelzebul,”All Greek manuscripts have ‘Beelzebul’, rather than the familiar ‘Beelzebub’, that is a carryover from the Latin. and “It is by the ruler of the demons that he casts out demons.”
